message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper proposes a new topic model that uses a Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN) based framework to give full characterization to the sequential order of words and their topic coherence within sentences. This makes it highly relevant to the arXiv sub-category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). Additionally, the use of RNNs and the focus on topic modeling also make it relevant to the sub-categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper's focus on improving performance on various tasks also suggests relevance to the sub-categories of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) and Information Retrieval (cs.IR).
